attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Citing fear on the financial-markets an opportunity exists to offer a series of Zero-Percent T-Bills [Bonds] to the public, local-authorities, corporate... investors.

Fabulous returns afforded by Icelandic-banks, BCCI... are a needless drain where taxpayer-bailouts given.

30-day, zero-percent bonds of interest to those mid-chain [property-sales]

1-year, zero-percent bonds for long-term investors, ditto 2-year, 5-year, 10-year.

Many prefer zero-percent to losing everything & UK-economy needs eye-watering public-&-private investments.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
